Class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.LanguageSettings
Inherited members: ShowHide

View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Class LanguageSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.LanguageSettings
  • public class LanguageSettings extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the client to configure which languages will be included in downloads for HLS, HSS, and DASH asset types The currently configured LanguageSettings can be accessed through the ISettings.getLanguageSettings call in ISettings. Modified settings are only applied once you call ISettings.setLanguageSettings and ISettings.save on the ISettings interface.

      boolean audioLanguageAllowed(java.lang.String language)
      Check if a specific language string is configured for audio download
      public boolean audioLanguageAllowed(java.lang.String language)
      Check if a specific language string is configured for audio download
      Parameters:
      language - the language string to look for in the set of allowed audio languages. If a null or empty value is passed, then the method will return true.
      Returns:
      true if no language strings are configured for audio downloads or the specified language is present
